projectPackage 0.0.0.9000

    • project_package-vignette

    Creates a new data frame with selected columns dropped from the old data frame

    data_cleaning.Rd

    Creates a new data frame with selected columns dropped from the old data frame

    data_cleaning(dataframe, columns)

    Arguments

    dataframe

    A data frame or data frame extension (e.g. a tibble).

    columns

    Name(s) of column(s) from the data frame

    Value

    A new data frame with columns dropped from the old data frame. If all columns are to be removed, an empty data frame will be returned.

    Examples

    data_cleaning(mtcars, c("mpg","disp","qsec"))
#>                     cyl  hp drat    wt vs am gear carb
#> Mazda RX4             6 110 3.90 2.620  0  1    4    4
#> Mazda RX4 Wag         6 110 3.90 2.875  0  1    4    4
#> Datsun 710            4  93 3.85 2.320  1  1    4    1
#> Hornet 4 Drive        6 110 3.08 3.215  1  0    3    1
#> Hornet Sportabout     8 175 3.15 3.440  0  0    3    2
#> Valiant               6 105 2.76 3.460  1  0    3    1
#> Duster 360            8 245 3.21 3.570  0  0    3    4
#> Merc 240D             4  62 3.69 3.190  1  0    4    2
#> Merc 230              4  95 3.92 3.150  1  0    4    2
#> Merc 280              6 123 3.92 3.440  1  0    4    4
#> Merc 280C             6 123 3.92 3.440  1  0    4    4
#> Merc 450SE            8 180 3.07 4.070  0  0    3    3
#> Merc 450SL            8 180 3.07 3.730  0  0    3    3
#> Merc 450SLC           8 180 3.07 3.780  0  0    3    3

#> Lincoln Continental   8 215 3.00 5.424  0  0    3    4

#> Toyota Corolla        4  65 4.22 1.835  1  1    4    1
#> Toyota Corona         4  97 3.70 2.465  1  0    3    1
#> Dodge Challenger      8 150 2.76 3.520  0  0    3    2
#> AMC Javelin           8 150 3.15 3.435  0  0    3    2
#> Camaro Z28            8 245 3.73 3.840  0  0    3    4
#> Pontiac Firebird      8 175 3.08 3.845  0  0    3    2
#> Fiat X1-9             4  66 4.08 1.935  1  1    4    1

#> Lotus Europa          4 113 3.77 1.513  1  1    5    2

data_cleaning(mtcars, "disp")
